title: At NYU, Students Were Failing Organic Chemistry. Whose Fault Was It?
description: Maitland Jones Jr., a respected professor, defended his standards. But students started a petition, and the university dismissed him.
dc:creator: Stephanie Saul
media:credit: Janice Chung for The New York Times
media:description: Students said Maitland Jonesâ€™s course was too hard and blamed him and his teaching methods for their poor showings.
